author: mikemaccana
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

'&&' is a common idiom for running a command if the previous command succeeded. For evidence for the popularity of adding this feature, including discussion with Jeffrey Snover, see  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/563600/can-i-get-to-work-in-powershell
